### Learning Objectives

1. How to use AI with code-execution tools to perform financial analysis and generate spreadsheets, reports, and presentations
2. How to use AI with code-execution tools to search, organize, and filter data and text
3. How to collaborate with AI in planning and evaluating work
4. How custom chatbots and AI agents work and are used in finance
5. How to use AI with code-execution tools as general agents
